data.author: Matt Langlois

changelog.release_notes: - Build for Pebble Time Round!!!
- 3.X for aplite
- Fixed: Force HTTPS
- Use latest pebble.js in preparation for Pebble Time Round
- Fix black menu bug

Added: Ability to customize the app colors in the settings
Improvement: Modified the way settings are saved for a smoother experience (your settings should not be affected)
Update: Use latest PebbleJS version

Update: Use latest PebbleJS version for an improved menu navigation experience
Improvement: Select now closes information cards
Fixed: Crashing on Pebble Time, right after splash screen
- Fixed: Undefined variable introduced in 2.13

Fixed: Decreased cached menu items to 50 instead of 100
Added: Splash screen while app loads
Added: Loading message if the menu item is still loading
Added: Server backend for custom groups
Updated: Menu option headers

Fixed: Scrolling issue where items are blank 
Fixed: Custom groups having no results all the time
Updated: New settings page look & feel 
Added: Ability to fetch event information directly from a timeline pin 
Added: First run welcome screen 
Added: Changelog screen 
Added: More colors and better PT support

- Ability to add custom groups
- Ability to search for events in custom groups
- Ability to pin custom events
- Fixed version string on about screen

- Ability to unpin events
- Fixed minor bug related to loading about data

- Fixed: More accurate error messages
- Fixed: Optimized when timeline functionality should display
- Fixed: Optimized resource size
- Fixed: Default settings to prevent null values from being passed
- Temp Fix: Cache more menu item to preven odd loading issues
- Added (TIME): Some life to the app through the use of colored menu icons
- Added (BW): Some life to the app through the use of B/W menu icons
- Added: About menu, with version information

- Fixed: Notification subscription errors
- Fixed: Group subscription errors
- Fixed: Error handling of raw timeline data

- Added: Have the subscription button reflect the user's group subscription status 'Unsubscribe' or 'Subscribe'
- Added: loading screens instead of nothing while waiting for a server response, to prevent confusion
- fixed preference saving issues for all-events
- Fix incorrect function call, causing error on SDK 2.9
- Fixed error message for SDK 2.9 devices. Sorry for such small and quick releases tonight.
- Fix for SDK 2.9 devices, sorry!

- Fixed issue with all-events subscription
- Updated to use the latest version of PebbleJS

data.description:
Keep on top of the upcoming Pebble & Other meetup events/groups in your area!

Actions include:
- View Pebble meetup groups, world wide!
- View upcoming Pebble meetup events within a configurable distance!
- View Configurable meetup groups, world wide!
-View upcoming nearby meetups for those custom groups!
- View the other members in the meetup groups.
- View events for a specific group.
- Fetch specific event information, including location, address, time, etc...
- Pin Events to timeline
- Subscribe to groups to get notifications about all upcoming events
- Subscribe to all events (in app settings) to receive notifications about all upcoming events
- Receive timeline reminders 1 day and 1 hour before the event
- Configurable location so you don't have to rely on your phones GPS, if you wish pebble not to know your GPS location (version 1.1)

Planned Features (in order of priority):
- View user's comments/meetup discussions
- Integration with your meetup account so you can: 
-- RVSP to events directly from your pebble
-- View RSVP status
-- View your non-pebble groups 
-- View your non-pebble events

Have a feature idea or find a bug? Feel free to send me a message using the support button!

Enjoy!

~Matt

Like the app? Has it saved you a few bucks by notifying you of a nearby meetup? Please consider donating: http://fletchto99.com/other/pebble/meetup/web/donate.php
data.title: Meetup
